entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023
